content:
Redundant Relevant Cues

  • Training data allows two different one attribute discriminations

    • Alphas are yellow balloons
    • Alphas are balloons that have been stretched

  • Classification of unseen items allows us to infer what was learned

  • Two groups of subjects (Different category label)

    • Alpha
    • Inflate

  • Hypothesize that inflate subjects will focus on “stretching”

  • Hypothesize that alpha subjects will vary
